message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly advantageous, deal for me.  Hope you'll agree!
I'll start with a fair offer, but I'm not afraid to negotiate. Your turn!
I'm willing to compromise, but let's make this a bit more even.  I think we can both do better than your last offer.
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll try to get a better deal for myself. Your turn again!
Let's be reasonable. This is my final offer. If you reject it, we both risk losing more money.  Think about it!
I'm not backing down. I think I can get a better deal than that. Your turn again!
